subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Heading into Sunday’s season-ending Ford 400 at Homestead-Miami Speedway, Jimmie Johnson was on the cusp of winning his record-tying third straight Nascar Sprint Cup championship.
snippet: Heading into Sunday’s season-ending Ford 400 at Homestead-Miami Speedway, Jimmie Johnson was on the cusp of winning his record-tying third straight Nascar Sprint Cup championship.
